body.name: HOUSE AGAIN Shoe Rack Storage Organizer, 8 Tier Tall Shoe Rack,Shoe Holder,Shoe Stand,Free Standing Shoe Shelf for Garage Closet Entryway, 26-30 Pairs Metal Shelf Large Stackable for Boot,Black
features: Large Capacity: This Boot Rack (34.4'' L x 12'' W x 54.4'' H) could easily hold 26-30 pairs of adult shoes. Taking a different height design, this shoe rack organizer perfectly fits high boots, high heels, snow boots, roller skates, sneakers, sandals, storage boxes, or other larger accessories, meeting your various storage demands and helping your home stay tidy.

Variety DIY: This rack boasts a modular design, so you can freely assemble and disassemble it to suit your needs. It can be assembled into an 8-layer tall shoe rack or split into 3-4 smaller racks. The organizer can be placed in different places to organize your shoes, such as a closet, entryway, garage, corridor, wardrobe, cabinet, dormitory, patio, etc.

Sturdy Structure & Durable: The structure of the shoe rack has thick metal tubes and premium PP pipe tees. The metal pipe adopts a black anti-rust coating process, which greatly enhances the service life and will not deform, making it more durable. With a sturdy frame, its maximum load bearing is up to 100 lbs., a great choice for hiking shoes and snow boots.

Waterproof & Easy to Clean: The shelf is made of a high-quality, non-woven material. The non-woven fabric is removable, waterproof, dustproof, and easy to clean. Furthermore, non-woven fabric tiers gently cradle heels and prevent dents while preventing dust from the upper tiers from falling.

Easy Installation & Guaranteed Service: The 8-tier shelf is easy to assemble without tools. House Again provides a detailed instruction manual and installation video. Please follow the manual and video carefully and install it according to our installation steps. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: This was such a great price and was easy to assemble and fits perfectly in my closet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Lightweight, adjustable,
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the HOUSE AGAIN 8-Tier Tall Shoe Rack Storage Organizer, 26-30 Pairs Shoes Shelf Wide Large Capacity Sturdy Durable for High Boot, Bedroom Entryways Garages Apartments.. It is an average quality shoe rack that you can assemble to fit your needs a few different ways. It takes a little bit of time to put it together because there are so many pieces, and you need to make sure the connector pieces are facing the right way or you may have to take it apart like I had to. It's not the most heavy duty rack at all. It does the job, but it's not going to be able to tolerate a bunch of weight or anyone running into it such as animals or children. The listing does claim to be able to support 100 lbs, but I still wouldn't push it. The base for the shoes is just a piece of fabric that you slide the poles through. Heels with narrow heels don't stand up well as the base isn't study enough. That fabric attracts hair and fur, but it is easy to just blow it off with your mouth. Lol. It's just an average quality, simple shoe rack to get some better organization going. I did order a 10-tier rack just like this that is the same exact concept and great for my heels. I do appreciate the options to change it up instead of it having to be one way completely if you have certain items you need more space for or just for it to fit in a certain space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and spacious
reviews.reviewText: I am so pleased with this purchase! It is exactly the size neccessary. Simple to assemble. String and sturdy. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stand does as required
reviews.reviewText: Wife likes it and it fits behind the bedroom door. Easy enough to put together. No issues thus far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to assemble and organizes the shoes.
reviews.reviewText: This shoe rack was the easiest thing to assemble, and feels fairly sturdy for a shoe rack. It holds a lot of shoes plus boots and keeps it looking so nice and organized. The shelves have a cloth like feel to them but are made of some kind of coated product that is very sturdy, holds up to dozen pairs of shoes quite easily. I had a very small plastic coated metal triple rack that kept track of all the shoes and it looked quite cheap. This one doesn’t look cheap and it is a whole lot taller than the previous one but it truly looks a lot nicer in my entryway. The plastic connectors are a durable plastic and the metal rods fit in them perfectly. I am very pleased with this product and would recommend it as a good purchase. I did have to rearrange the things on that wall as the rack is very wide. My son ask me if “I had measured the space” well of course not, why would I do that. LOL

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Assemble, Solid Construction
reviews.reviewText: This shoe stand was easy to assemble (took me 40 minutes or less but it was smooth sailing). When assembling, you make five long shelves and three short shelves and then stack them. You can speed up the process by grouping materials to create an assembly line of sorts. Even without doing that, everything is so well labeled, it is pretty simple.I was concerned that this would be flimsy but am really impressed with how solid it is. The shelves are not quite wide enough for two pairs of men’s shoes or boots. That’s my only complaint. Two pairs of women’s and kids shoes fit easily.I omitted one shelf to make it shorter to fit in my space. I love that it can be switched around without a lot of trouble!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good shoe rack
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty nice shoe rack. I like that you can kinda move around the double height spots to your liking (I also like that is has those taller spots because my partner has a lot boots). The assembly was pretty easy, I did mess up right I. The beginning and had to disassemble and reassemble it correctly, the instructions aren’t super clear tbh. It feels pretty sturdy once all put together, but I would recommend putting you heavier shoes on the bottom, or to somehow anchor it to the wall, but that’s really more of an issue of height to footprint ratio, not any fault of the product itself. All in all I’d for sure recommend getting it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A small closet must have!!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great find! I don’t have a lot of closet space for all of my shoes, so this rack comes in handy. It was easy to put together and it’s very sturdy. Great product!
